articles.author: Arika Herron
articles.title: Indiana Senate rejects Trump's redistricting effort - Axios
articles.description: The redistricting bill would have likely given the GOP two more seats in Congress.
articles.content: Driving the news: After three hours of debate, the Indiana Senate voted 31-19 against a new congressional map that would have carved up the state's two Democratic districts to give Republicans a soli… [+3165 chars]
